addNetworks.title: Ƙara Hanyoyin Sadarwa zuwa Walat
addNetworks.description: Danna kowace hanyar sadarwa don ƙara ta zuwa MetaMask, Rabby, ko wasu walat na Web3
addNetworks.noResults: Ba a sami hanyoyin sadarwa ba

addNetwork.connectWallet: Da fatan za a haɗa walat ɗinka da farko
addNetwork.alreadyPending: Ana jiran buƙatar. Duba walat ɗinka.
addNetwork.error: An kasa ƙara hanyar sadarwa. Da fatan za a ƙara ta da hannu.

networkWarning.title: Hanyar Sadarwa Ba Daidai Ba
networkWarning.message: Musanya token yana samuwa ne kawai akan BSC Chain. Da fatan za a canja zuwa BSC don musanya tsoffin tokens ɗinka.

bridge.selectDestinationPlaceholder: Zaɓi wurin da za a nufa
bridge.noDestination: Babu wurin da za a nufa
bridge.noBridgeableTokens: Babu tokens da za a iya gadawa
bridge.addTokenError: Ba a iya ƙara token zuwa walat ba
bridge.historyStoredLocally: Tarihin ciniki yana adana a cikin na'urar nan

settings.title: Saituna
settings.rpcEndpointsHelp: Sabunta URL na RPC da ake amfani da shi ga kowace sarka a cikin zaɓaɓɓen muhalli.
settings.noChainsConfigured: Babu sarƙoƙi da aka saita don wannan muhalli.

banner.title: Sabo ne a nan?
banner.message: Koyi game da Freedom Bridge da yadda za ka gada TigerOG tokens a tsakanin sarƙoƙi.
banner.note: Lura: Musanya token yana dindindin kuma ba za a iya dawo da shi ba.

hero.title: 'Yanta <1/> <2>Kadara</2> naka
hero.subtitle: Gada TigerOG tokens ba tare da matsala ba tsakanin sarƙoƙi ta amfani da Axelar Interchain Token Service. Mai tsaro, sauri, kuma kyauta daga haraji.

features.title: Interchain Token Service
features.description: Freedom Bridge yana amfani da Axelar ITS don samar da ingantacciyar ƙwarewar gadawa mara tsada, mai aminci, kuma kyauta a duk faɗin fiye da {{count}} blockchains.

stopDecay.title: Dakatar da Rushewa
stopDecay.description: Tsoffin tokens suna ƙone 10-11% na darajar ku a kowane saye da siyarwa. Musanya zuwa TigerOG yana dakatar da wannan zub da jini nan da nan, yana kiyaye 100% na darajar ku.

conversion.title: 1:1 Musanya
conversion.description: Jimlar wadata ba ta canzawa. Ana riƙe tokens a cikin amintaccen kwangilar musanya, kuma ana amfani da daidai 1:1. Babu hauhawar farashi, babu raguwa.

multichain.title: Multi-Sarka
multichain.description: Deploy sau ɗaya, shiga ko'ina. Kadarar ku ta zama ɗan asalin interchain token a duk faɗin sarƙoƙi ciki har da Ethereum, BNB Chain, Base, da ƙari.

security.title: Tsaron Axelar
security.description: An kunna ta hanyar tsarin masu tabbatarwa na Axelar. ITS tana tabbatar da cewa tokens ɗinku an canja su lafiya da kuma daidai a duk faɗin hanyoyin sadarwa masu alaƙa.

cta.title: Shirye don gada?
cta.description: Shiga juyin juya halin interchain. Yana ɗaukar ƙasa da minti ɗaya don musanya kadaran ku kuma fara gadawa ta Axelar.

buyTokens.title: Sami Kadarori
buyTokens.description: Ba ka da wasu tokens tukuna? Saya tokens na asali akan PancakeSwap, sannan musanya su zuwa sabbin sigogin multichain.

header.title: Takardun
header.subtitle: Koyi yadda ake musanya tsoffin tokens da gada tsakanin sarƙoƙi.

whatIs.title: Menene Freedom Bridge?
whatIs.content: Freedom Bridge yarjejeniya ce ta raba gari wacce aka gina akan Axelar's Interchain Token Service (ITS). Tana ba ku damar musanya tsoffin tokens zuwa kadarori marasa haraji masu dacewa da interchain waɗanda za su iya motsawa cikin walwala a tsakanin blockchains masu tallafi.
whatIs.taxFreeTitle: Canja wurin Ba tare da Haraji ba
whatIs.taxFreeDesc: Tsoffin tokens sau da yawa suna da haraji 10%+. TigerOG tokens suna da haraji 0%.
whatIs.omnichainDesc: Motsa kadara nan take tsakanin {{count}}+ blockchains ta Axelar.

howToConvert.title: Yadda Ake Musanya Tokens
howToConvert.step1: Haɗa walat ɗinka zuwa tushen sarka (misali, BNB Chain).
howToConvert.step3: Zaɓi tsohon token da kake son musanya.
howToConvert.step4: Amincewa da kwangilar Musanya don kashe tokens ɗinka.
howToConvert.step5: Danna Musanya don ajiye tsoffin tokens ɗinku da karɓar daidai adadin "TigerOG" tokens.
howToConvert.note: Lura: Musanya yana haifar da harajin ciniki na tsohon token (yayin da ake haɓakawa) idan token ɗinka yana cajin haraji akan canja wuri. Duk da haka, da zarar an canza zuwa TigerOG, duk canja wuri da gadaje na gaba ba su da haraji.

supportedNetworks.title: Hanyoyin Sadarwa Masu Tallafi
supportedNetworks.content: Freedom Bridge yana tallafawa ci gaban yanayin halittu na {{count}}+ blockchains, yana ba da damar haɗin kai mara kyau a duk faɗin yanayin EVM ta Axelar.

xerc20.title: Interchain Tokens
xerc20.content: Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS) yana ba da damar tura tokens a duk faɗin sarƙoƙi da yawa tare da daidaitaccen adireshin da gudanar da wadata ɗaya. Freedom Bridge yana amfani da ITS don tabbatar da cewa TigerOG ya kasance kadara na asali a duk inda aka gada shi.

axelar.title: Axelar Network
axelar.content: Muna amfani da Axelar a matsayin layin haɗin kai. Axelar yarjejeniya ce ta raba gari wacce ke haɗa blockchains daban-daban, tana ba da damar sadarwa mai tsaro tsakanin sarƙoƙi da canja wurin kadara. Tsarin tsaro na Axelar ya dogara da saitin masu tabbatarwa marasa izini, yana ba da babban tsaro ga interchain tokens.

conversion.title: Hanyar Musanya
conversion.content: An tura kwangilar Musanya akan BSC. Lokacin da kuka musanya, ana aika tsoffin tokens ɗinku zuwa adireshin matattu (ana ƙone su har abada) kuma kuna karɓar TigerOG a rabo na 1:1. Wannan tsari ne na hanya ɗaya — ana lalata tsoffin tokens kuma ba za a iya dawo da su ba.

security.title: Tsarin Tsaro
security.content: An gina tsaro a cikin kowane matakin Freedom Bridge:
security.point1: Tsarin Musanya: Ana ƙone tsoffin tokens har abada ta hanyar amintattun kwangiloli masu kaifin baki, marasa canzawa.
security.point2: Masu Tabbatar da Axelar: Ana tabbatar da saƙonni tsakanin sarƙoƙi ta hanyar cibiyar sadarwa ta Axelar.
security.point3: Wadata Mai Dorewa: ITS tana sarrafa ƙirƙira da ƙone don kiyaye jimlar wadata a duk faɗin sarƙoƙi.
security.point4: Kwangiloli da Aka Tantance: An gina su akan daidaitattun ɗakunan karatu na masana'antu na Axelar da OpenZeppelin.

supplyCommon.verificationDesc: Duk lambobin wadata za a iya tabbatar da su da kansa akan sarka:

tigerogSupply.title: Rushewar Wadata na TigerOG
tigerogSupply.intro: TigerOG yana da ƙayyadaddun wadata mai yawo wanda aka samo daga ainihin BNBTiger token. Lissafin wadata yana lissafin duk tokens da aka ƙone da kuma waɗanda aka kulle har abada.
tigerogSupply.lpLocked: LP An Kulle (86.18% na LP An Ƙone)
tigerogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Tokens da aka aika zuwa 0x000...dEaD an ƙone su har abada kuma ba za a taɓa iya dawo da su ba. Wannan ya haɗa da tokens da aka ƙone ta hanyar tsarin haraji na asali na BNBTiger.
tigerogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Akwai ƙaramin adadin tokens da suka makale a cikin kwangilar BNBTiger kanta. Waɗannan tokens ba su da damar shiga kuma an cire su daga yawo yadda ya kamata.
tigerogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap liquidity pool yana ƙunshe da BNBTiger tokens da aka haɗa da BNB. Lokacin da aka ƙone LP tokens (an aika zuwa adireshin matattu), ainihin tokens a cikin pool ɗin suna kulle har abada.
tigerogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: LP tokens da aka ƙone: 86.18% na duk LP tokens
tigerogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Saboda haka, 86.18% na tokens a cikin LP suna kulle har abada
tigerogSupply.note: Lura: TigerOG yana riƙe da rabo na 1:1 tare da BNBTiger yayin musanya. Wadata mai yawo na TigerOG yayi daidai da ainihin wadata mai yawo na BNBTiger bayan lissafin duk tokens da aka ƙone da aka kulle.
tigerogSupply.launchData: Bayanin Kaddamarwa: Waɗannan lambobin an lissafa su a lokacin kaddamarwa. Tsohon BNBTiger token yana ci gaba da ƙone tokens a kowane ciniki na saye/siyarwa, don haka ainihin wadata mai yawo na iya zama ƙasa da yadda aka nuna.

lionogSupply.title: Rushewar Wadata na LionOG
lionogSupply.intro: LionOG yana da ƙayyadaddun wadata mai yawo wanda aka samo daga ainihin BNBLion token. Lissafin wadata yana lissafin duk tokens da aka ƙone da kuma waɗanda aka kulle har abada.

lionogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Tokens da aka aika zuwa 0x000...dEaD an ƙone su har abada kuma ba za a taɓa iya dawo da su ba. Wannan ya haɗa da tokens da aka ƙone ta hanyar tsarin haraji na asali na BNBLion.
lionogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Akwai ƙaramin adadin tokens da suka makale a cikin kwangilar BNBLion kanta. Waɗannan tokens ba su da damar shiga kuma an cire su daga yawo yadda ya kamata.
lionogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap liquidity pool yana ƙunshe da BNBLion tokens da aka haɗa da BNB. Lokacin da aka ƙone LP tokens (an aika zuwa adireshin matattu), ainihin tokens a cikin pool ɗin suna kulle har abada.

lionogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Saboda haka, 99.98% na tokens a cikin LP suna kulle har abada
lionogSupply.note: Lura: LionOG yana riƙe da rabo na 1:1 tare da BNBLion yayin musanya. Wadata mai yawo na LionOG yayi daidai da ainihin wadata mai yawo na BNBLion bayan lissafin duk tokens da aka ƙone da aka kulle.
lionogSupply.launchData: Bayanin Kaddamarwa: Waɗannan lambobin an lissafa su a lokacin kaddamarwa. Tsohon BNBLion token yana ci gaba da ƙone tokens a kowane ciniki na saye/siyarwa, don haka ainihin wadata mai yawo na iya zama ƙasa da yadda aka nuna.

frogogSupply.title: Rushewar Wadata na FrogOG
frogogSupply.intro: FrogOG yana da ƙayyadaddun wadata mai yawo wanda aka samo daga ainihin BNBFrog token. Lissafin wadata yana lissafin duk tokens da aka ƙone da kuma waɗanda aka kulle har abada.

frogogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Tokens da aka aika zuwa 0x000...dEaD an ƙone su har abada kuma ba za a taɓa iya dawo da su ba. Wannan ya haɗa da tokens da aka ƙone ta hanyar tsarin haraji na asali na BNBFrog.
frogogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Akwai ƙaramin adadin tokens da suka makale a cikin kwangilar BNBFrog kanta. Waɗannan tokens ba su da damar shiga kuma an cire su daga yawo yadda ya kamata.
frogogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap liquidity pool yana ƙunshe da BNBFrog tokens da aka haɗa da BNB. Lokacin da aka ƙone LP tokens (an aika zuwa adireshin matattu), ainihin tokens a cikin pool ɗin suna kulle har abada.
frogogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: LP tokens da aka ƙone: 99.31% na duk LP tokens

frogogSupply.launchData: Bayanin Kaddamarwa: Waɗannan lambobin an lissafa su a lokacin kaddamarwa. Tsohon BNBFrog token yana ci gaba da ƙone tokens a kowane ciniki na saye/siyarwa, don haka ainihin wadata mai yawo na iya zama ƙasa da yadda aka nuna.

header.title: Kwangiloli Masu Kaifin Baki
header.subtitle: Adireshin turawa na hukuma don tokens da gadaje a duk faɗin tsarin halittu na Freedom Bridge.

interchainTokens.title: Interchain Tokens
interchainTokens.description: Interchain tokens da aka tura ta Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS). Waɗannan tokens suna da daidaitattun adireshin a duk faɗin hanyoyin sadarwa masu tallafi.

axelarNetwork.title: Axelar Network
axelarNetwork.description: Yarjejeniyar saƙon da ke tallafa canja wuri tsakanin sarƙoƙi da tabbatar da daidaiton bayanan tsakanin blockchains daban-daban.

conversionContracts.title: Kwangilolin Musanya
conversionContracts.description: Suna da alhakin musanya tsoffin tokens zuwa kadarori na interchain. Waɗannan kwangiloli suna sarrafa ajiyar da ƙirƙirar akan tushen sarka.

conversionContractsTable.title: Adireshin Kwangilolin Musanya
conversionContractsTable.subtitle: Waɗannan kwangiloli akan BSC suna sarrafa musanya daga tsoffin tokens zuwa interchain tokens.

faq.title: Freedom Bridge Taimako
faq.subtitle: Amsoshin tambayoyin da ake yawan yi game da TigerOG, gadawa, da Axelar.

cta.title: Har yanzu kuna da tambayoyi?
cta.description: Shiga al'ummar mu akan Telegram ko duba Wiki mai zurfi don jagororin fasaha.

questions.a1: Musanya tokens ɗinku zuwa TigerOG yana cire harajin ciniki (sau da yawa 10-12%) da ke da alaƙa da tsohon token. Hakanan yana ba ku damar gada waɗannan tokens zuwa wasu blockchains kamar Ethereum, Base, da ƙari ta hanyar Axelar, yana ba da damar shiga sabbin tsarin halittu.
questions.q2: Shin amintacce ne amfani da Freedom Bridge?
questions.a2: Haka ne. Yarjejeniyar tana amfani da amintaccen kwangilar Musanya da Axelar's Interchain Token Service. Lokacin da kuka musanya, ana ƙone BNBTiger ɗinku har abada kuma kuna karɓar TigerOG a rabo na 1:1. Tsarin ƙonewa yana tabbatar da cewa an sarrafa jimlar wadata daidai a duk faɗin sarƙoƙi.
questions.a3: Freedom Bridge da kansa baya cajin kuɗi don musanya. Kuna biya ne kawai daidaitattun kuɗin gas na blockchain. Gadawa tsakanin sarƙoƙi yana haɗa da kuɗin gas na interchain da aka biya Axelar don rufe kuɗin turawa.
questions.q4: Menene zai faru idan na rasa tokens dina?
questions.a4: TigerOG tokens suna aiki kamar kowane ERC20 token. Idan ka rasa damar shiga walat ɗinka, ba za a iya dawo da su ba. Kullum ka kiyaye maɓallan sirri da kalmomin dawowa naka amintattu.
questions.q5: Zan iya musanya tokens na TigerOG zuwa BNBTiger?
questions.a5: A'a. Musanya canji ne na hanya ɗaya. Lokacin da kuka musanya BNBTiger zuwa TigerOG, ana ƙone tokens ɗin BNBTiger ɗinku har abada (ana aika su zuwa adireshin matattu). Wannan an tsara shi ne — TigerOG shine sigar da aka haɓaka, mara haraji da aka nufa don maye gurbin tsohon token gaba ɗaya.
questions.q6: Wadanne hanyoyin sadarwa ne aka tallafa?
questions.a6: Muna tallafawa sarƙoƙin EVM da yawa ta Axelar, gami da BNB Chain, Ethereum, Base, da ƙari. Bincika Wiki don cikakken jerin hanyoyin sadarwa masu tallafi.
questions.a7: Saurin gadawa ya dogara da lokacin ƙarshe na tushen sarka da turawar Axelar. Yawanci, canja wuri tsakanin sarƙoƙi yana ɗaukar kimanin minti 2-5.
questions.q8: Menene wadata mai yawo na tokens na OG?
questions.a8: Kowane OG token yana da ƙayyadaddun wadata mai yawo wanda aka samo daga ainihin BNB token nasa, yana lissafin tokens da aka ƙone, ma'aunin kwangila da suka makale, da LP da aka kulle. TigerOG: ~3.66 septillion (36.62% na asali). LionOG: ~3.83 septillion (38.33% na asali). FrogOG: ~8.39 septillion (83.86% na asali). Bincika Wiki don cikakken bayani na kowane token.

common.failedToSwitchNetwork: An kasa canja hanyar sadarwa. Da fatan za a canja da hannu a cikin walat ɗinka.
common.unableToDetermineGas: Ba a iya tantance biyan kuɗin gas na Axelar ba
